Text: Thanks for your continuing effort to bring quality TV to the world.

Can't thank you enough for your daily efforts. Sorry if I dont keep on thanking every single day, but be sure that you're the one person I have to thank for bringing happiness every single day to us Chelsea fans. Appreciate it a lot, hugs from brazil!
yup.  ur the reason i am able to still watch this show since I have more from North America to Spain.    thank u so much!
